Entry.JapaneseText: 相変わらず、男と女が話せないなんて、 めんどくさい街だぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: This town is as annoying as ever, what with men and women not being able to talk to each other.

Entry.JapaneseText: 決まりを破っちまったら どうなるのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what happens when you break that rule?

Entry.JapaneseText: 破る事すらできないんじゃないかしら。 彼らは子供の頃から戒律の下で育ってるから。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't think they would. They've been raised to uphold these commandments from childhood, after all.

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律を破る事は死にも等しい事、 そう教え込まれてるはずだからね。
Entry.EnglishText: They've been taught that breaking the commandments is tantamount to death.

Entry.JapaneseText: ぬぬぬ……厳しいぜ。 こんな街に生まれなくってよかった……
Entry.EnglishText: Mhhh... That's harsh. Boy, am I glad I wasn't born here...
